00413 int alloc_tracadv(int NZED, int NY, int NX, double ***vartrac)
00414 {
00415 
00416     vartrac = alloc3d(NZED,NY,NY);
00417     if(vartrac == NULL) {
00418         fprintf(stderr,"not enough memory for tracer variables!\n");
00419         return 1;
00420     }
00421 
00422   return 0;
00423 }
00424 
00425 int alloc_error(char* arr_name)
00426 {
00427   fprintf(stderr,"not enough memory for %s!\n", arr_name);
00428   quit(2);
00429   return 2;
00430 }
